record.description: What attracted this large crowd went unrecorded. In the background a four-man shell sits in the water near the pier. [Photograph] courtesy of the Chicago Historical Society.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached to cardboard back, but it is beginning to peel away from its backing. On back of photo (not cardboard) is Stamp: credit line/Stamp: copyright.
record.noteCopyright: If reproduced kindly make the following acknowledgement: Courtesy Chicago Historical Society
